org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm
Class MobilityDomain

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.domain.DomainAdapter
          org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm.MobilityDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Domain, GenericStateModel
public class MobilityDomain
extends DomainAdapter

This component is the mobility domain, which just has the MobilityFactory and no LogicProviders.

The original idea was to add security by restricting access to the MobilityFactory, which is required to create a AgentControl.
